name: Red Falls Season 1
description:
Game Info:
You are a college student madly in love with your girlfriend, but instead of spending summer with her, you receive an unexpected phone call. Next day you’re on a bus going to work in a boys educational and misbehavior camp, but to your surprise it’s not boys camp anymore…
Red Falls is currently in EARLY ACCESS and only Episode 1 is available.
Currently available content: Red Falls Episode 1
- 1000+ IMAGES
- 50 ANIMATIONS
- 8 HOT Female characters
Gameplay:
- Free roam
- Time Cycle
- In-game Hint system
- Define the relationships within the game
- Change angle of animations
- Change angle of images
- Nude mode renders (x-ray vision)
Development info:
Red Falls Season 1 is planned to have a total of 5 episodes.
Episode 2 is in development...
Planed content and features for Season 1(All 5 Episodes):
- 10.000 images
- 300+ animations
- FULL VOICE-OVER (for all female characters)
- Interactive sex scenes
- Gallery
- Hot Scene replay
- Steam Achievements
- Trading cards
WARNING!
This game features adult content and some content that some users might find offensive the game might include topics that some users might find offensive such as sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug/alcohol abuse.
